abstract: Warning about a gathering wave of home foreclosures, Ben S. Bernanke pledged new regulations to limit the impact and crack down on predatory mortgage lending.
snippet: Warning about a gathering wave of home foreclosures, Ben S. Bernanke pledged new regulations to limit the impact and crack down on predatory mortgage lending.
lead_paragraph: Ben S. Bernanke, the Federal Reserve chairman, added fresh warnings on Friday about a gathering wave of home foreclosures bearing down on American communities, while pledging new regulations to limit the impact and crack down on predatory mortgage lending.

headline.main: Fed Chief Warns Anew on Foreclosures
